channel.title: Phil Collins on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Phil Collins on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Take a look at me. Now.
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: Today’s issue is dedicated to a troll named Brian Pee, who posted a mean petition on Change.org to discourage Phil Collins from his upcoming comeback attempt, only to end it when it started getting attention from the media. By the time he did, it had 4,352 signatures—and Pee was trying to laugh it off as a “silly joke” that had gotten out of hand. But before this guy fades into the ethers of dumb meme history, I have to interject here.
